name: Particulate Matter App
description: The Particulate Matter App is an application for monitoring of one or several sensors in a network of particulate matter sensors. On the map you can see all sensors worldwide, which are registered in the network. Any number of sensors can be added and monitored. Comparing sensor data is possible too.  Do you want to help us translating the app? Please send an email to contact@chillibits.com.  If you want to support the project financially, please visit https://github.com/sponsors/marcauberer  If you want to use our web app, please visit https://pm.chillibits.com  For questions, please visit: https://chillibits.com/pmapp/en/faq  Info: The app isnt able to measure dust with an Android device. We recommend a smog sensor from https://luftdaten.info/en.  The app is OpenSource: https://github.com/chillibits/particulate-matter-app
